description: Traces how an author's own prior works serve as conditions of possibility for their current arguments. Uses composed chains of enhanced engines to profile the target work, scan prior works with relationship-aware strategies, and synthesize findings through multi-stage analysis (cross-work synthesis, functional analysis, evolution tactics, conditions of possibility). Classifies each prior work's relationship type and adapts analysis accordingly. Operates in comprehensive mode (extract all ideas, trace all) or targeted mode (probe specific ideas).

passes.pass_description: Comprehensive profiling of a target work's ideas, vocabulary, methodology, metaphors, and framing through a 3-engine chain: conceptual framework extraction, semantic constellation mapping, and inferential commitment mapping.

Classify each prior work's relationship to the current work (direct precursor, indirect contextualizer, different-field-relevant, counter-position, tangential). Fast classification that determines how Pass 2 analyzes each work. Runs once per prior work. Independent of Pass 1 output â€” depends only on the prior works collection.

Scan each prior work for genealogical traces using a 2-engine chain (concept evolution + concept appropriation tracking). Adapts analysis strategy based on relationship classification from Pass 1.5, with runtime context parameters injected dynamically. Runs once per prior work.

Multi-stage analysis through a 4-engine chain: (1) cross-work idea synthesis with evolution timelines and convergence/divergence detection, (2) functional analysis of how concepts serve the argument, (3) evolution tactics detection (10 intellectual self-management tactics), and (4) conditions of possibility analysis (Foucauldian path-dependence). Collapses former passes 3-6 into a single chain execution.
Generate comprehensive genealogical report synthesizing all findings from the profiling, scanning, and analysis passes into a unified narrative.

output_description: Comprehensive genealogical analysis tracing idea evolution, detecting tactics, and assessing conditions of possibility through composed engine chains
